website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 is a smooth-performing midrange slate, but it's overpriced compared to similar tablets.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 8.0's multiwindow feature provides smooth navigation, and its performance is consistently fast
It houses a microSD card expansion slot and can be used as a universal remote
cons: Given its simple specs, the $279 starting price is overreaching
The plastic build feels cheap and the screen resolution is notably subpar

customer_reviews.title: It is decent, not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Well to begin with I like the overall feel of it, most said it's the closest thing to an mini iPad, to me it's slow in loading pages, great on games and movies for some reason I can't get the Facebook messenger to full download, it starts but never completes after numerous attemps, also there is no warranty of any kind once purchase . For that reason I am thinking of returning it. I only had it a week now.
customer_reviews.author: joseph miller

customer_reviews.title: Painfully Slow
customer_reviews.text: Tablet runs painfully slow with extended SD Memory. Menu bar most often does not swipe down.
customer_reviews.author: esob

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely pleased with this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I was used to using an ipad 2 (work computer) and wanted my own personal tablet. I was worried that I would miss the 10 inch screen, but I don't. I love the size of this Galaxy tab (8 inch) and the screen resolution is perfect. It also is lighter and fits in my purse, even with a case on it. I love that I was able to add a micro USB to increase the storage (not able to do this on any ipad). My husband and I searched and compared tablets for a long time before we bought this one, and I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: White Bark clan

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Nice table! Better than the Nook tablet from Barnes & Noble for a lot of games my son wanted to play were not compatible on the Nook. More storage space too. Funny, Barnes & Noble is now providing Samsung tablets....I just downloaded the nook app on to here......It has a smooth and friendly user interface. I did not like the 'kid' user feature though. My son loves it, less frustration for the both of us. Delivery was as expected as always. Love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ni

customer_reviews.title: This Tablet is Awesome and great for Gaming which is one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This Tablet is Awesome and great for Gaming which is one of the reasons I got it. It runs smoothly and the resolution is great. So far no cons. I bought this Tablet for myself and I bought my wife a Nexus 7 (2013) and they are both pretty amazing. If anything I would say the Nexus is a bit better for social networking where as the Samsung is more for entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: but Google Docs pretty much fills the bill
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this tab! I had a 7-inch SG Tab 2, and this one is so much faster. The 8-inch screen makes for much easier Web browsing and reading, too. It can handle full sites instead of just mobile versions. Very thin profile and light. Wish it came with Polaris Office, but Google Docs pretty much fills the bill. The Fintie case fits it perfectly. Thanks for quick shipping, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet so I can't compare it to others but I love it! The size is perfect for what I use it for, the touchscreen works perfectly, the color and clarity of the screen is fabulous. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat. I got this cover for it -- WAWO Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 8.0 Inch Tablet Smart Cover Creative Fold Case -- and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: NikoNano

customer_reviews.title: It is a great starter tablet
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple durable tablet. The screen resolution is weak, and the camera does not have a flash. It is a great starter tablet, or tablet for a child. For the price it is awesome. I sue this for work daily. If you want a basic no frills tablet, this is for you. If you want bells, and whistles; upgrade. If you want a something simple buy this tablet. If you are into electronics, you probably already know, this tablet is for beginners on a budget. If it fits your needs buy.
customer_reviews.author: David Wright

customer_reviews.title: keep it up samsung, great price!
customer_reviews.text: love it. the screen is awesome, battery life amazing, does everything i want it too. purchased the 7in from walmart first, returned it when i noticed it was 30$ cheaper here, then I made a dumb mistake and got the dragon touch ax1 thinking I could save even more money, oops! now im back on the samsung 8in and ill never go back! SD card slot is a must, something others dont offer, cough cough!
customer_reviews.author: Gbear LaGorilla

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade sw before thinking in returning it
customer_reviews.text: I had the Tab 1 before this one, so is a huge improvement for me. The first day I was using it, I was disappointed, the tablet was slow and freezes many times, I was thinking in returning it, but then a message to upgrade the software appeared, so I did. After the upgrading everything started to work and now I'm delighted, bright colors, fast response, light weight, for me is a fives stars
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience
customer_reviews.text: this is advertised as an 8 inch screen but when it arrived it was only a 7 inch screen, and it happened to me twice.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Both were easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old. He loves it! He had no problem on how to use it without instructions. Had no trouble with either the WiFi or the bluetooth. Both were easy to set up. Have found that if you play games with high graphics the battery life is around 4 hours. When used with games with low graphics and music we got the 8 to 10 hour life.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Sharp resolution. Beautiful, light.weight. Camera quality is not so good, which is obvious. Speakers to the back is not a very good idea, since sounds get muffled when the device is laid down. Battery life needs improvement. Takes about 6 hours to charge and a user can barely get 6 hours of use!!! Preloaded software takes up about 4gb of 16gb. Working very well.
customer_reviews.author: lindy

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a really good tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this tablet has a lot of the original features of the Samsung Galaxy smart phone but also a lot of really cool and new features that you wished your phone had. It's not huge, fits in a man's pocket, is light, the screen shows pretty clear video and it takes decent pictures. Plus for the price we got it for (less than $200), for a used tablet that was only opened once, it was a huge steal.
customer_reviews.author: gss

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no complaints. Runs fast and does everything I could want in a tablet. I bought this after my Nexus charging port broke. This one doesn't seem like its going to have that issue. The charger cord could definitely be a little longer though, its actually quiet short. Would be worth it buying a new one. But other than that the tablet works great.
customer_reviews.author: brett russell

customer_reviews.title: Ther was a battery problem with these tablets. After ...
customer_reviews.text: Ther was a battery problem with these tablets. After ordering two and returning them I ordered from a different vendor as this was something that I really wanted. I might add that the latest order from a different source has worked as it was intended to work. And no battery problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ande

customer_reviews.title: Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but problems and customer support is the absolute worse, really the absolute worse. 4 different phone calls all lasting more than 45 minutes with no results other than them asking me for more money or getting hung up on. It is a shame to make a purchase like this that lasts less than a year. Now Samsung wants $99.00 plus S&H to repair their issues!!! They should be ashamed of themselves. It also would be nice to speak with someone who actually speaks English !! Maybe it is time to get rid to all my samsung devices and go with APPLE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: Last year I bought a Dragon Touch tablet and found it next to useless - sitting right under a wireless modem was dawg slow response - taking 90 seconds or so to load a web page. This year I went for the Samsung and it did everything it should do, perfectly. Don't waste your time with cheaper brands
customer_reviews.author: bloomz

customer_reviews.title: First Tablet, and I love!!
customer_reviews.text: My brother said to get this one. I had a gift card, so that knocked some off the price. My first tablet, and I love it !!!! I can check email and bookmarked my favorite sites to visit. I went to You Tube to watch videos on how to use it. So glad I got it. I ordered a case to protect it from drops, and ordered a zippered case to protect it while in my purse. Just love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like it. This is day one.
customer_reviews.author: My opinions are mine only

customer_reviews.title: has some flaws..
customer_reviews.text: Looked good.. was pleased at first but I noticed a dead pixel towards the bottom of the screen and the screen isn't as responsive as it should be. I got it for someone and she said she can live with it but I'm a bit upset.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: ... is the first tablet I have owned and I like it quite a bit
customer_reviews.text: This is the first tablet I have owned and I like it quite a bit. I checked out many of them before buying and the 8 inch seemed to be a good size. It is easy to carry around but biggest to be able to see clearly and have a big enough screen. It has a micro SD slot so you can expand memory. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GI John

customer_reviews.title: 8" Tab 4 better than 7" Tab 3
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a Samsung Galaxy 7" Tab 3 to this 8" Tab 4. Worth the money especially with the reduced price. I get a stronger wi-fi signal throughout my house. It's faster with more built in storage. The bigger screen and keyboard make it easier to type and view. And it's still small enough to be very portable.
customer_reviews.author: OrdinaryGuy

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. I recently upgraded from the Galaxy Tab 3 and am glad I decided to go with the 8 inch. It has double the internal memory my other tablet had and is faster with a few system upgrades. I use this tablet for everything and rarely use my laptop anymore because of it.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: For my mom
customer_reviews.text: Got this tab for my mom after her laptop gave up on her. She loves this thing. She takes it everywhere. Netflix plays good. All videos play good on this. She has no complains so far.
customer_reviews.author: The Odd Couple

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted. This tablet is easy to use and performs well. I am not a tech person, like so many these days, but the Samsumg Galaxy Tab 4 really is easy to understand and use! I use it more than my regular computer now. I installed a router and use the tablet in my living room and around the house. It works well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma traveler

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor
customer_reviews.text: The day I opened it up, it kept rebooting itself after a few minutes. Tried multiple fixes, nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Mizu

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchase this for my first tablet. Its pretty good and fast. Unfortunately the battery life dies very quickly when using the wifi for streaming or watching youtube videos. The battery also takes a very long time recharge. For me it takes at least 7 hours to fully recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Springfield

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!  Large external memory card capacity perfect for storage of many sign language videos.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet. Everything works and it works well. I was new to the tablet world but found the Galaxy Tab 4 to be intuitive and it was easy to figure out the settings. Downloaded videos run smoothly and the picture is very clear. I use this tablet for sign language videos only so the larger memory card capacity makes this tablet the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: Issuba Lusa

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet to Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Can't seem to put down this table. The font is a great size, the display is rather clear, the camera megapixels are a bit low, but it still takes reasonably good pictures, and the battery life is amazing. Furthermore, the tablet arrived when it was supposed to, and the packaging was just right to keep it safe.
customer_reviews.author: AdriaV

customer_reviews.title: Love My Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations. It's bigger than what I thought it would be. Love my tablet, plus it came extremely quicker than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brih Renee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet - as good as, if not better than my Samsung Galaxy phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! For a few dollars more, I recommend this 8-inch one as opposed to the 7-inch galaxy. Perfect tablet, works similarly to my Samsung Galaxy phone, Android-based so you have access to all of the Google Play apps, beautiful colors/screen/resolution, very thin/lightweight, easy to use. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Naztazia

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it... AND the expandability afforded via Micro SD cards! Lots of music and movies.... used "Any Video Converter" to install onto the tab and the SD card.... Actually seems faster than the IPAD Mini.... plus SD card support makes it much better for Media...
customer_reviews.author: El Villa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this tablet for a month now and I am just loving it. Given some the reviews I expected the speakers to be low but I find the speakers are quite loud for watching movies etc. The tablets fits well in my hand and is quite light to carry around. I am not a techie person but from a lay man's perspective I can say that everything works well. My only issue was not the tablet it self but the failure to be able to access and receive any of the free offers with the exception of the drop box. I am so happy with the tablet that I am getting my daughter one for her sixteenth birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It depends on what you need
customer_reviews.text: I get this for my 8 years old son, we already have ipads and android devices. So far so good, good screen resolution, and size, also is very ligth compared to our current ipad. The fact we can add a 64gb micro sd card is just great. Android works smoothly, the camera is not good to take pictures but is fine to take videos. I am very pleased for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: ed contreras

customer_reviews.title: Had a Kindle Fire (tried to save $) and hated it. I ordered this Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a Kindle Fire (tried to save $) and hated it. I ordered this Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 and LOVE LOVE LOVE IT I can't even think of words to say how much. I didn't sign up for WIFI because i have a phone for when i'm out and about. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Fully Satisfied with Samsung Galaxy Tab 4, 8" 16GB version.
customer_reviews.text: Screen size is perfect. The tab is slim and its easy to carry around. Touch is awesome, butter smooth. screen is bright & display is sharp enough. Samsung has not mentioned anything about OTG support, the memory card expansion it would support, upgrading to Android L. A big question mark. Overall the product is good after my usage of 1 month, no lags and hangs till now.
customer_reviews.author: Arun J.

customer_reviews.title: It has excellent battery life expecially when connecting with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I use this tab as my Bible and my mp3 player. There are countless programs available to do many things,from email to sleep programs. It has excellent battery life expecially when connecting with Bluetooth. A good buy
customer_reviews.author: J. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Belongs to a child and still going strong years later
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Only Complaint- Can't stream Prime
customer_reviews.text: The SWYPE is awesome for typing and holding a child. Pictures are great. I have had no problems syncing it to my various calendars and email accounts. One complaint, can't stream Amazon Prime! Otherwise, I would give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good little tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've used it almost daily, mainly for reading books and surfing web. It's a bit difficult to see in sunlight. Battery life has declined, but that's typical.
customer_reviews.author: Ripstones

customer_reviews.title: Overall solid tablet
customer_reviews.text: The Tab4 works well for my needs -- email, searches, games, photos. Power saver mode works fine for all this. Screen clarity great. One problem for me -- back of the Tab4 is very slippery;.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little tablet for basic things
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tablet for basic things, but it's pretty simple and doesn't have a lot of capabilities, compared to some other tablets. I basically feel like it's my phone, only bigger, and unable to make calls or text.
customer_reviews.author: Karriemh

customer_reviews.title: I bought this and a laptop as a gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a laptop as a gift for my mother. She uses this tablet more! she really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Myers

customer_reviews.title: samsung Galaxy Tab 4
customer_reviews.text: Objected to some of the personal downloads by Circuit City since this was intended as a gift. They did not give me courtesy of a reply. The moulding on the device does not seem as refined as they are on previous Tab models. Device itself operates very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. Perfect size for me and I've had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: godsgrl

customer_reviews.title: Portable Power
customer_reviews.text: So much faster than my old computer in surfing the net, checking facebook and keeping up with news. Portable power. Love it. Just wish it would run some of my older programs. Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: Zoraida Colon-Collado

customer_reviews.title: Wife is pleased with it as 20th anniversary present.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses as an alternate to her GS4 mini, and she loves it. All android Google information is on both devices, and the battery time is excellent. Great price and nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C. Bross

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. The size is perfect. I can carry it in my (larger) purse and it goes with me everywhere. I use it for streaming music, reading kindle and nook books, e-mail, facebook, etc. It's a great little tablet at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product just what we wanted for GPS on our travels
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: The tablet is working fine otherwise but my concern is if more lines are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an update since my last review. Two weeks ago I have noticed a long green thin line down the left side of the screen. the tablet did not fall but when one of the "techie" guys at my office looked at the screen he says the pixels are going. Since the 30 day window has passed for me to request replacement what do I do? The tablet is working fine otherwise but my concern is if more lines are going to come up or the one that is there will get wider.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Walters

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. I use it to study, surf the web and play games. It is great. Long lasting battery. The only concern is that don't work with 4G, just wifi, but it's not a big deal for me. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Canto da Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit slow and don't work with dji app
customer_reviews.author: Randall Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this tablet...except that pictures are stored with Google and unable to put on SD card. Learned that SD card must be default to store pictures.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn stocks

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet, just wanted something for travel, reading. access the internet. It's very easy to use, sharp great pictures and screen.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce Dejesus

customer_reviews.title: Great little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great little tablet. Not much of an instruction book so hopefully I'll figure out how to do what I want to do with this. It takes awhile to get used to the touch screen and I've found a stylus seems to help in typing. I'm not sure it will replace a stand alone computer but it is light and will be my travel device for accessing the internet.
customer_reviews.author: L Squared

customer_reviews.title: great great great
customer_reviews.text: I love my tablet. I searched for days looking for the right tablet for me and I am definitely pleased with this one. This is my first tablet and I love the size, the speed, the graphics, everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie-q

customer_reviews.title: Fast answers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet for my grandma, she was looking for something simple and that could take good pictures, unfortunately she wasn't satisfied with the camera, the seller was very comprehensive and willing to return the money. I'm very satisfied with the fast response
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: got 2 of these for my grandkids for xmas. they love them. I have a Galaxy Tab 3 10" and these have a much sharper screen and better response time. games and netflix look great.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: Better than average
customer_reviews.text: Light,easy to handle and so great to see the pics and aps. Does all the necessary functions perfectly and is easy to charge up. Great price for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: nobode2no

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on a tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good deal on a tablet for the price. Has good performance, graphics and picture quality. Lacks a USB host port connection for USB thumb drives and HDMI port but can use chromecast instead to cast to TV.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fun

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet. It's fast, great resolution, great for games, movies, music, productivity. Lightweight and thin too. This was a replacement after I first purchased an Asus 8inch tablet which turned out to be junk. The Samsung one is 210% better for a little bit more money. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: W Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice price point, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a few months ago, still going strong. Does everything i need, no complaints. Bought it with a Pellem SG2014 Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 8.0 Case, which fits nicely, protects screen, and screen cover can be folded into a stand. Would recommend both.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Overstock Planet is not the best place to buy technology there
customer_reviews.text: I liked that I was able to download more videos and songs, but I certainly didn't like the fact that I found scratches on the device itself even though I contacted the owner about the situation and even before if it would have any and totally ignored me the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Tab works great, I actually like it better than my previous tablet Galaxy Note 10.1) It's not a top of the line tablet with top of the line hardware. I'm not using it to hack the Pentagon either. Graphics are OK, not great but ok. It's not for the extreme gamer either. I do moderate to heavy Web, email, & apps. I use word, pp, & excel. I've had no issues with use. You just have to know your resources and how to move them around in order to get the most out of the tab. The entire process from purchase to receipt of device was thoughtless. I bought it and two days later it was on my doorstep!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was a bit slower than I expected from the shipped date, but otherwise, I love this tablet. Images are beautifully clear, sound is very good, and it works great for taking notes (with a bluetooth keyboard) or for referring to PDF docs in meetings. I use it constantly for reading books or listening to music while commuting.
customer_reviews.author: R in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Love the size. Only draw back is how difficult it is to put movies on. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great great tab
customer_reviews.text: really enjoy this, like the size, can be taken and concealed easily, still finding my way around, but really do like it, I'd recommend to anyone looking for this size tab
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works as it is suppose to, learning curve just as with all.
customer_reviews.author: burwof

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a kindle fire and this blows that away by a very long shot. i coudn't be happier. Only wished I'd spent more money and got the bigger one. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It's small enough to fit in a glove box yet large enough for her silly games. Screen is good and battery life seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Soreena

customer_reviews.title: My tab 3 was purchased at Best Buy a couple years ago
customer_reviews.text: Christmas Gift...he loves it. My tab 3 was purchased at Best Buy a couple years ago...no difference (except this was a better deal). I got the protection plan with it also. Easy Peasy.
customer_reviews.author: TLS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Delivery and product condition is very good.
customer_reviews.author: The Professor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size with lots of great features
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size with lots of great features. Price point wise though, you might as well gets its upgrade the Tab S or S2.
customer_reviews.author: T.S. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I can't imaging being more pleased. Love to watch videos. The sound and image quality are excellent for such a small device. Yes I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tap

customer_reviews.title: Battery life seems pretty good, but she doesn't use it 24/7
customer_reviews.text: So far my wife loves it. Very similar operation/format to her Samsung Galaxy phone. Battery life seems pretty good, but she doesn't use it 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: DirtDiver

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: OK, but there IS a learning curve to those of us who haven't used the operating system A User manual would be a BIG help!!
customer_reviews.author: lobo012847

customer_reviews.title: camera are the only things that are not perfect. Everything else is good enough for me
customer_reviews.text: Sound, camera are the only things that are not perfect. Everything else is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: IKE

customer_reviews.title: Really love it.
customer_reviews.text: My kindle was dying and I decided to switch to this. I really love it. Easy to use. Great Graphics, pictures. The camera is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great, my wife really loves it
customer_reviews.text: works great, my wife really loves it. Its small and light to carry around easily and fast to use on a very regular basis. no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Pravitt Gourh

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet all round
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is well made and I think the 8 inch is perfect size. I also use a Samsung phone and had received the promotional 50 gb dropbox space 2 years ago. I thought I would be eligible for 50 gb now that I have a new Samsung device however the dropbox help says the following. •You're only eligible to redeem the same type of promotional deal once. For instance, you can't redeem the Samsung promotional deal of 48 GB for two years more than once, even if you buy multiple eligible devices. Still the tablet is great and fantastic value for money
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my 7" Samsung tablet. I really like this model. It's fast and the extra inch of screen makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Blourtango

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! I use it to teach and it;s great! It came with an office app so I can view all my .pdf books and the screen is awesome! it has a confortable size.
customer_reviews.author: venezuelaArenas

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot of very good apps. I installed a 64 Gig micro SD ...
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I wanted in a tablet. Has a lot of very good apps. I installed a 64 Gig micro SD card, so no need for the cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff so far but after a few hours of ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff so far but after a few hours of use it's noticeably slower, granted I DID load it with a bit of music and two movies.
customer_reviews.author: Crystalline

customer_reviews.title: So far it's doing what I need it to do ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it's doing what I need it to do. I have no complaints about how it's working. I didn't give it 5 stars because I thought an 8 inch screen was a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Lawana Ormond

customer_reviews.title: ... but the overall speed of the device seems very good. I mostly use it for internet browsing and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my only 'tablet' so I have nothing to compare with but the overall speed of the device seems very good. I mostly use it for internet browsing and occasional ham radio 'apps' (DroidPSK) and it works perfectly for that - fits easily in a backpack or bag. Using Firefox I have had up to 15 tabs open and the performance was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for both of us
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, one for my husband and one for myself. Works great for both of us, very bright and clear screen. Nice that it works with our phones.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie c.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet with a few amazon gift cards that I had gotten for Christmas. It's been great since I got it. The screen is crystal clear and with the 'Samsung 64GB EVO Class 10 Micro SDXC up to 48MB/s with Adapter (MB-MP64DA/AM)' I bought to go along with it, it can run and hold all of my favorite games.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: i did'nt like it.
customer_reviews.text: simply looks older than the description. could easily see it was opened either to fix it or what whereever...
customer_reviews.author: Neema

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like my tablet very much. So far so good. :o) the camera sucks though. :o)
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet. I like the size and the operating system. The graphics are awesome. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: shellmich17

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love samsung and this tablet works great. Don't need a service provider just need wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy works well and came in fast also great packaging
customer_reviews.author: ulysses jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy very much
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy very much. An outstanding tablet. It's Much smarter than I am. Recommend to anyone looking for a large tablet.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Goid buy.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my galaxy tab 4 8.0 for over two years and it's still in good shape. In fact, i'm writing this review on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of a Kind!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Wonderful!!! Terrific!!! SO glad I purchased this Samsung Tab 4, it is exactly what I've been looking for! (Now if I can only find the right screen protector for it...hmmmm...)
customer_reviews.author: Clarence345

customer_reviews.title: It's a fine android device
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. She is really enjoying it. It's a fine android device, very fast and great display.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Buying used in like new condition saved me $80 on best prices for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve443

customer_reviews.title: I love my galaxy!
customer_reviews.text: I own both android and iOS device and the galaxy tab 4 is by far the best.the 8 inch model is much better than the 7 inch model.
customer_reviews.author: Death Val Guy

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 (8-Inch, Black)
product_meta.description:
AT A GLANCE:
 * High-resolution, 8.0-inch display for vivid detail
 * Read e-books, watch movies, play games, browse the web, and more
 * IR blaster allows you to use tablet as universal remote
 * Search TV listings and receive recommendations
 * Share your tablet with multi-user mode
 * Switch to Kids Mode for a colorful, easy-to-use interface
 * Rear and front cameras for photos and video chat
 * Add up to 64 GB memory with microSD slot
 * Easily multitask with two apps using Multi Window
 * Lightweight, portable design

CRISP, CLEAR DISPLAY FOR HOURS OF IMMERSIVE ENTERTAINMENT
BRILLIANT, HIGH-RESOLUTION DISPLAY FOR EXCEPTIONAL DETAIL
Ideal for reading, playing games, browsing the web, or watching movies, the Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 features an 8.0-inch, 1280x800 resolution screen, so you experience rich graphics, bright colors, and crisp text.

RECEIVE PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS WITH WATCHON
The WatchON feature lets you type in your zip code and cable provider to browse and search current TV listings and get personalized recommendations based on your viewing history.

FUNCTIONS AS A UNIVERSAL REMOTE CONTROL
The Galaxy Tab 4 has a built-in IR blaster, which allows you to use the tablet as a universal remote control.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR PREFERENCES AND SHARE YOUR EXPERIENCES
SHARE YOUR TABLET WITH MULTI-USER MODE
Great for sharing your tablet with family members, multi-user mode lets you add up to eight profiles. This allows up to eight different users to log in separately, so you each see only your own apps, backgrounds, and email.

KIDS MODE OFFERS A CHILD-FRIENDLY INTERFACE
Create a separate profile for your kids and switch to Kids Mode--a child-friendly interface that is fun and easy to control. Parents can track the time their kids spend and even set preferences to manage which features their children can access.

BUILT-IN CAMERAS FOR PHOTOS AND VIDEO CHAT
Equipped with a 3-megapixel rear camera and a 1.3-megapixel front camera, the Galaxy Tab 4 lets you take photos and video chat with friends and family members.

Personalize your experience with separate logins. View Larger.

Use two apps at once on the same screen. View Larger.

EXPANDABLE MEMORY AND EASY MULTITASKING
LIGHTWEIGHT, PORTABLE DESIGN
At only 0.31 inches thick and weighing .69 pounds, the Galaxy Tab 4 is comfortable to hold and convenient to take with you wherever you go.

EXPANDABLE MEMORY TO STORE PHOTOS, MUSIC, AND VIDEOS
The tablet offers 16 GB of onboard memory and includes a microSD card slot that allows you to add up to 64 GB of additional memory, making it easy to store more songs, videos, photos, and games.

USE TWO APPLICATIONS AT ONCE
With the Multi Window feature, you can place two applications side by side and drag content from one app to the other. You can even open the same app twice, which is handy if you're writing two email messages or want to reference two websites side by side.

FREE CONTENT WITH GALAXY PERKS
COMES WITH SIRIUSXM, DROPBOX STORAGE, AND MORE
With Galaxy Perks you'll receive free content and services, including three months of SiriusXM Internet Radio for new users, three audiobooks from Audible for new users, 50 GB of Dropbox space, and more.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 8.0, USB charging cable, wall adapter, and quick start guide.

Take photos with a 3-megapixel rear camera. View Larger.



AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Android 4.4 Kit Kat OS, 1.2 GHz quad-core Qualcomm processor
16 GB Flash Memory, 1.5 GB RAM Memory
64GB of memory available through a microSD slot and 50GB of free Dropbox storage
Comes with over $300 of free content and services
